detectors.description:
TokenTimelock.depositTokens(address,uint256) (../../../Desktop/mainnet/0a/0a3b99aa2571299d56019e5f90c916e85aad6bf1_TokenTimelock.sol#204-214) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(tokenBalance.add(_amount) == token.balanceOf(this)) (../../../Desktop/mainnet/0a/0a3b99aa2571299d56019e5f90c916e85aad6bf1_TokenTimelock.sol#209)

Reentrancy in TokenTimelock.depositTokens(address,uint256) (../../../Desktop/mainnet/0a/0a3b99aa2571299d56019e5f90c916e85aad6bf1_TokenTimelock.sol#204-214):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(tokenBalance.add(_amount) == token.balanceOf(this)) (../../../Desktop/mainnet/0a/0a3b99aa2571299d56019e5f90c916e85aad6bf1_TokenTimelock.sol#209)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokenBalance = tokenBalance.add(_amount) (../../../Desktop/mainnet/0a/0a3b99aa2571299d56019e5f90c916e85aad6bf1_TokenTimelock.sol#210)

detectors.description:
Claimable.transferOwnership(address) (../../../Desktop/mainnet/0a/0a3b99aa2571299d56019e5f90c916e85aad6bf1_TokenTimelock.sol#110-112) should emit an event for: 
	- pendingOwner = newOwner (../../../Desktop/mainnet/0a/0a3b99aa2571299d56019e5f90c916e85aad6bf1_TokenTimelock.sol#111)

Claimable.transferOwnership(address).newOwner (../../../Desktop/mainnet/0a/0a3b99aa2571299d56019e5f90c916e85aad6bf1_TokenTimelock.sol#110) lacks a zero-check on :
		- pendingOwner = newOwner (../../../Desktop/mainnet/0a/0a3b99aa2571299d56019e5f90c916e85aad6bf1_TokenTimelock.sol#111)

Reentrancy in TokenTimelock.depositTokens(address,uint256) (../../../Desktop/mainnet/0a/0a3b99aa2571299d56019e5f90c916e85aad6bf1_TokenTimelock.sol#204-214):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(tokenBalance.add(_amount) == token.balanceOf(this)) (../../../Desktop/mainnet/0a/0a3b99aa2571299d56019e5f90c916e85aad6bf1_TokenTimelock.sol#209)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- beneficiaryMap[_beneficiary] = beneficiaryMap[_beneficiary].add(_amount) (../../../Desktop/mainnet/0a/0a3b99aa2571299d56019e5f90c916e85aad6bf1_TokenTimelock.sol#213)
